page.title: 16WITCHES IN GREAT LEIGHS
page.content: In St.Annes Castle there is a strange room,because when everything is tidied up it mysteriously becomes messy.Some people think it is a poltergeist,others say that Mother Haven,a witch who haunts the pub. She is supposedly looking for her child who was murdered there.Some say she was buried at Scrap Faggots Green where a stone was rolled over her grave to stop evil spirit escaping. During World War II Americans moved the stone to clear their path. Unusual things happened;some comical, some frightening.In a local farm chickens and ducks swapped places without signs of activity.The church clock lost 1 hr every day and the bells tolled by themselves in the early hours of the morning.
